name: Terror in Kitchen
description:
This game was made for TriJam 167 in team of 2

Please note that this game was NOT made in the 3h limit for the Jam

We are sorry, but because of cofiguration issues you need to have Python 3.10 or newer installed to play this game.

Controls

Move - WSAD

Shoot - Left Click

How to play

Run away from zombies and pick up powerups. Because you can't see anything, you will have to use their smell instead, to see where to shoot. Pick up powerups to get stronger and survive.

Powerups

- Increases your fire rate - Increases your damage - Enemies make smell more often- You walk faster- Heals you. You can not pick it up, if your HP is full

We know the game is not really good, but this is our frist game jam, and we didn't use any game engine, so keep that in mind please. Constructive criticism will be nice though.

Art made in GIMP

Music made in Bosca Ceoil

Sound effects made in sfxr

Game made in Python using Pygame library
